definition: a great hero may appear timid, the wise may appear stupid (idiom); the general public may not recognize great talent
pinyin: da4 yong3 ruo4 qie4 , da4 zhi4 ruo4 yu2

definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to be stupid/to cheat or deceive/me or I (modest)
